## CommonSessionCreateParams.payment\_method\_types property

A list of the types of payment methods (e.g., `card`<!-- -->) this Checkout Session can accept. Defaults to `["card"]`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
payment_method_types?: PaymentMethodType[];
```
